title: Calculating Differences on North American Servers Only?
body:
I have tried every fix regarding the Calculating Differences and Unspecified Error Occurred errors and I have fully downloaded the patch on every other server and it lets me launch the game fine however when I switch back to the North American Server I launch the launcher and Calculating Differences | 1 Files Scanned is all that shows in place of the launch button and eventually turns into Unspecified Error Occurred.

I have tried every fix provided in these forums and they would work for a short period of time but then I would eventually get Unspecified Error Occurred. 

Help would be greatly appreciated, I have been stuck like this for 5 days now.

replies.body:
Not exactly sure why you'd only experience this on the NA servers. Could be a connectivity issue. Let us know if this works or not.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj
I have tried each and every one of those fixes.
By the way, my firewall is down and I have checked to see if there are any processes running on my computer that could be scanning League files in the background and have found none.

A lot of patching issues can be resolved by the steps on our [Patching Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) 

Let me know if it helped.

Update:
Tried Patching on an Ethernet connection and I was able to patch all the way through and launch the game. Unplugged Ethernet went back to my room connected to wifi and tried to queue for a game and was kicked off. Closed the launcher and restarted it and what do ya know Calculating Differences | 1 Files Scanned.

> [{quoted}](name=Xidomus,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZaclKqHV,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-12T00:25:06.957+0000)
>
> Update:
> Tried Patching on an Ethernet connection and I was able to patch all the way through and launch the game. Unplugged Ethernet went back to my room connected to wifi and tried to queue for a game and was kicked off. Closed the launcher and restarted it and what do ya know Calculating Differences | 1 Files Scanned.

Update 2.0 :
Went into Device Manager>Network Adapter>(Adapter Properties)>Fragmentation Threshold 
and changed it to 300 and it worked???
Any idea what that was about???
